source.name: Maddison (2001) and 'The 2015 Total Economy Database'
source.dataPublishedBy: Angus Maddison (2001) ‘The World Economy: A Millennial Perspective’. Development Centre Studies. Paris: OECD; The Conference Board: ‘The 2015 Total Economy Database’
source.additionalInfo: Missing observations for East Germany has been obtained by linear interpolation between 1950 and 1960.
